title: Entertainment Live: James May's new job; Michael Douglas's $1m prize - BBC News
summary: denies clarkson invited back to top gear .
chris evans quits the one show .

documents.title: hasta la vista
text: well , that 's the best of today 's arts and showbiz news - we hope you 've been entertained , and will join us again on monday as we catch up on all the weekend 's shenanigans .
look out for arnie on tonight 's graham norton show , as he talks terminator genisys .
and in the meantime , get out into the sunshine , before the rain sets in - after all , it 's glastonbury next weekend !
author: Victoria Lindrea
Arts and entertainment reporter

documents.title: modern art bonanza
text: christie 's in london has been showing off a collection of modern art which it has been tasked with selling next week .
one of the key lots is bouquet pres de la fenetre , by marc chagall , which is estimated to fetch between £ 2.5m and £ 3m .
a bronze cast by augustine rodin , which has a top estimate of £ 800,000 , is also among the lots included in impressionist modern art sale on 23 june .
for a more modest £ 8,000 you might be able to up pablo picasso 's ceramic plate tete au masque - although it 's probably not dishwasher-proof !

documents.title: on your bike
text: wilko johnson and the surgeon credited with saving his life will be reunited this weekend at a cycling event to raise funds for research into pancreatic and bowel disorders .

dr emmanuel huguet , who performed radical surgery on wilko last year to remove a tumour the size of a football , will join more than 120 gastrocyclists on the cambridge-to-london tour de france stage to the olympic velodrome , with wilko greeting the riders at the finish line .
`` i was lucky .
i survived pancreatic cancer because of groundbreaking surgery .
for too many pancreatic cancer is a death sentence , '' said wilko .
`` i am pleased to support gastrocycle and

documents.title: search for a star
text: with the news that the bbc is holding open auditions to find new co-hosts for chris evans on top gear , we take a look at a selection of previous high-profile open auditions and how the winners fared .
from star wars to harry potter , from inxs to hear'say , the open audition has worked with varying degrees of success .

documents.title: who loves ya , baby ?
text: british screenwriter philip gawthorne will write the screenplay for a modern day film adaptation of the classic tv series kojak .

gawthorne , who has written predominantly for british tv shows such as casualty and eastenders , takes over writing duties from james bond scribes neal purvis and robert wade , who wrote a previous draft of the screenplay .
kojak is intended to be a starring vehicle for hollywood 's vin diesel , who will also produce .
the actor most recently starred in furious 7 , with worldwide takings of more than $ 1.5bn .
the original series aired from 1973-1978 and starred telly savalas as the lollypop-sucking lieutenant theo kojak .
author: Deadline

documents.title: scientology film to get uk release
text: alex gibney 's controversial scientology documentary , going clear , will be released in the uk , despite pressure from the church of scientology not to release the film .

uk lawyers acting for the organisation have contacted at least one company and individual involved in the film 's theatrical release warning of potential copyright infringement should the film be screened in the uk .
however , distributors and exhibitors - who asked not to be named - are pressing ahead with plans to show the film .
the film sees gibney quiz former members of the church of scientology - including filmmaker paul haggis - revealing alleged abuses and strange practices within the organisation .
the church of scientology has previously denounced gibney 's film as `` bigoted propaganda '' informed by former members whom it calls `` misfits '' .
it was released in us cinemas and on us tv in march , through hbo , drawing in more than 5.5m viewers and becoming the network 's biggest documentary premiere in almost a decade .
author: Screen Daily

documents.title: trust mansion 'a shell '
text: the national trust is hoping to rebuild its clandon park mansion , although it does n't yet know the full extent of the damage a devastating fire caused .
the surrey house went up in flames in april and has been left a shell .
we 're hopeful that one day we can rebuild clandon but quite how , when and in what form is far from certain at this early stage .
the house has been left a shell , with the inside of the building almost completely destroyed .
we 're still awaiting guidance from the structural engineers on the safety of the house .

documents.title: exploring yves st laurent
text: yves saint laurent has been hailed as a legend and a genius , and now a major exhibition of his work is coming to the uk .
opening next month , the exhibition at the bowes museum in county durham will feature some of the designer 's most famous outfits .
the bbc 's rebecca jones has been to paris to find out more about the man who revolutionised the industry .

documents.title: bieber sued over copyright
text: justin bieber and usher are facing a $ 10m legal action over claims that the singers illegally copied parts of a song composed by two virginia songwriters .
the case , originally brought in 2013 , was revived on appeal .

devin copeland , an r & b singer known as de rico , and his songwriting partner mareio overton claim that three versions of the song somebody to love , recorded by bieber , usher or both , shared the beat pattern , time signature , and similar chords and lyrics with their song with the same name .

`` after listening to the copeland song and the bieber and usher songs as wholes , we conclude that their choruses are similar enough and also significant enough that a reasonable jury could find the songs intrinsically similar , '' concluded circuit judge pamela harris .

documents.title: brian williams apologises
text: former nbc news anchor brian williams has issued an apology for embellishing reports about his time covering the iraq war .
his slot anchoring the nightly news has now been permanently given to lester holt , who has been covering during williams ' suspension .
williams ' has now been moved to the cable news network msnbc to cover breaking news .
`` i 'm sorry .
i said things that were n't true .
i let down my nbc colleagues and our viewers , and i 'm determined to earn back their trust , '' he said , in a statement .

documents.title: kapoor reacts to vandalism
text: anish kapoor is understandably upset that his work in france 's palace of versailles has been vandalised , and has lashed out at those who criticised the piece as offensive .
the piece was called disrespectful after kapoor was quoted in a statement that it represented the .
`` the vagina of the queen coming in to power '' .
he later said the piece could be interpreted many ways .
following the vandalism , he said :
the vicious voice of the few has commanded too much of the debate and has even drawn in good thinking people .
it has now resulted in an act of vandalism to the work .
i am left with a question about how i should react .
should the paint that has been thrown all over the sculpture be removed ?
or should the paint remain and be part of the work ?
does the political violence of the vandalism make dirty corner dirtier '' ?
does this dirty political act reflect the dirty politics of exclusion , marginalisation , elitism , racism , islamophobia etc .

documents.title: yarnbomb blues
text: an knitter who has been `` yarnbombing '' local landmarks in the hertfordshire town of royston has thanked vandals who keep throwing her work around .
laura whitford has been decorating the town with knitted nets to publicise a craft fair but the pieces have been continuously removed and chucked on to roofs and trees .
but she says the fair has received more publicity than she could ever have hoped for after posting about the missing yarn on social media .

documents.title: entourage cast dismiss misogyny claims
text: the entourage movie has been taking a bit of a battering from the critics , who have called it misogynistic and shallow .
but the cast are calling on fans to ignore the reviews and judge the movie for themselves .
our reporter spoke to key members of the entourage posse .
hollywood is a very sexist place where we as women are objectified a lot .
to act , in the movie , like that does n't exist would be absurd .

documents.title: songwriters go in to hall of fame
text: cyndi lauper , van morrison and lady gaga were among the latest crop of inductees in to the songwriters hall of fame .
the trio attended a ceremony in new york , where they saw their songs performed by other artists who are big fans .
carly rae jepson sang lauper 's time after time , while michael buble performed moondance .
the grateful dead 's jerry garcia was inducted posthumously alongside the band 's lyricist robert hunter , as was linda perry ( with lady gaga ) .

documents.title: reeling in emmy voters
text: the emmy nominations process is under way and netflix is going all out to promote a raft of dramas and comedies .

it 's enlisted titus burgess from unbreakable kimmy schmidt to remind voters of why they should vote for his show , and the platform 's other offerings , in a video billed as `` for your binge-watching consideration '' .

documents.title: chris evans quitting the one show
text: chris evans is leaving his once-a-week slot on the one show to concentrate on his new top gear job .
more background on his decision to leave the bbc one magazine programme will be revealed during tonight 's episode at 19:00 .
he currently presents the show on a friday , alongside regular host alex jones .
matt baker joins her monday to thursday .

documents.title: superhero no-show
text: comic-con , the annual fan convention in san diego with something of a cult following , will be missing some key players next month .
marvel studios , home of the avengers , has announced it will not be attending - and nor will fellow studios sony pictures and paramount pictures .
`` it was n't a knock against comic-con , '' one spokesperson explains , `` the film cycles just did n't allow it . ''
sony and paramount apparently did n't have the material to promote , while marvel already unveiled its new wave of avengers at a special fan event in october .

however , fans will not be disappointed : the latest from the star wars and hunger games films will be given an early outing , while there are rumours that justice league , which features batman , superman , the flash and aquaman , will be among other surprises .
so do n't hang up your capes just yet .

documents.title: two maidens for the price of one
text: with frontman bruce dickinson now on the mend , iron maiden

the 11-track album - with a running time of 92 minutes - includes two tracks written solely by dickinson , including empire of the clouds , the longest maiden song ever recorded at just over 18 minutes .
`` by the time we 'd finished we all agreed that each track was such an integral part of the whole body of work that if it needed to be a double album , then double it 's going to be ! ''
said dickinson , in a statement .
the singer underwent treatment for cancer

documents.title: rip rick ducommun
text: actor and comedian rick ducommun , best known as the nosey neighbour opposite tom hanks in cult 1989 film the burbs , has died aged 62 .

first and foremost a stand-up comedian , and a regular performer on comedy central , ducommun also featured in some of the biggest movies of the '80s and '90s , including groundhog day , die hard and scary movie .
`` he was funny , talented and creative , '' said his brother , peter ducommun .
`` i think what people admired most was his stand-up .
he was a comedian 's comedian .
anyone who had the opportunity to see him live , loved his material . ''

documents.title: zoe saldana 's 'baby shower '
text: good to know it 's not always glamorous being an a-list actress , even when you are clearly travelling by private jet - as star trek actress zoe saldana revealed , when she instagrammed her baby son 's lunch all over her top .
it 's life zoe , but not as you know it

documents.title: shows in monte carlo triumph
text: shows happy valley , the missing and marvellous have won multiple awards at the monte carlo television awards .
a trio of british actresses sarah lancashire , frances o'connor and gemma jones were given awards , while jones ' co-star - the unrelated toby jones - won best actor in a tv film .
happy valley and the missing both up two awards , while marvellous - about stoke city kit man neil baldwin - won three .
second series of both the missing and happy valley - with lancashire reprising her role as police officer catherine cawood - are due to return this year .

documents.title: denies clarkson asked back
text: the bbc has denied it invited jeremy clarkson back as host of top gear , months after he was axed from the job .
clarkson told the sun , for whom he writes a regular column , that an unnamed bbc executive had `` asked if i 'd come back to top gear '' last week .
but clarkson said he refused : `` it would have been impossible to make the show i 'd want to make , '' he said .
the bbc has named chris evans as the new host .
a spokesman said : `` we have n't offered another top gear contract . ''
`` the bbc had placed on record its thanks to jeremy for his broadcasting on the programme and wish him well for the future . ''

documents.title: amy schumer does madonna
text: comedian amy schumer will open madonna 's sell-out gigs at new york 's madison gardens in september , part of madge 's rebel heart tour .
the comedian revealed the news on twitter , along with an early audition of her singing madonna 's 1989 hit like a prayer .
no word yet on whether she will duet with the queen of pop

documents.title: from captain phillips to captain sully
text: tom hanks , hollywood 's favourite everyman , is in talks to play hero pilot captain sully in the forthcoming clint eastwood film .
captain sully came to worldwide attention with his emergency landing on the hudson river after the passenger jet he was flying was hit by a flock of geese .
thanks to his quick-thinking , all 155 people on board survived .
hanks - who , at 58 , is six years younger than captain sully - was eastwood and the studio 's first choice .
but scheduling could prove tricky .
hanks is currently shooting inferno with ron howard for sony and eastwood wants to begin shooting in september .
hanks will also need to spend time promoting steven spielberg 's cold war thriller bridge of spies this autumn , in the hope of an awards run .
author: The Hollywood Reporter

documents.title: strange beasts at strawberry hill
text: sculpture laura ford is scattering her wares across the house and grounds of the historic strawberry hill in richmond , london .
among the 36 sculptures are elephants in pyjamas , primped poodles , kangaroos made of coffee bean bags and slumped knights .
the collection features a mixture of works from ford 's back catalogue and specially-commissioned pieces for the exhibition , which opens to the public on saturday and runs until 1 november .

documents.title: james may drives on
text: james may 's next career move has been unveiled - a bbc two show about the car manufacturing industry .
building cars live will see may , kate humble and ant anstead step inside the bmw mini plant in oxford , where a car is built every 67 seconds .
the two 90-minute episodes will also look at the health of british manufacturing and the history of car-making around the world .

kim shillinglaw , controller of bbc two and bbc four , said : `` broadcasting live from the car factory is a really exciting way to reveal the science , engineering and expertise behind the cars on our roads . ''

documents.title: new will young video
text: will young , who recently topped the uk album charts with 85 proof , has released the video for his new single thank you .
85 proof is his first album in four years .

documents.title: douglas receives $ 1m prize
text: michael douglas has received the $ 1m genesis prize in israel for his work promoting the jewish faith .
he was accompanied by wife catherine zeta jones , and their two children .
speaking ahead of last night 's award ceremony , he explained that he had only recently embraced his jewish roots - his father - kirk - was born to jewish parents but his mother is not jewish .
he said he would use the money to build bridges between israel and jewish communities around the world .

`` abraham 's tent had its flaps open and so hopefully , since approximately half of the jewish population in the world is outside of israel , we can find ways to better understand each other and to grow together , '' he told the associated press .

documents.title: eavis milks it
text: glastonbury founder michael eavis has said `` the farm comes first '' despite finding fame as host of the world-renowned rock festival .
the 79-year-old dairy farmer set up the festival on his somerset farm in 1970 .
stars including the rolling stones , dolly parton , bruce springsteen and jay-z have played at the festival , which opens its gates for the annual three-day event next week .
but , in a new bbc film , eavis says the `` rock 'n ' roll and the glamour of all that stuff , you know , it is not really in the same league '' as the dizzy heights of dairy farming .
he cites the moment he won the gold cup for best herd from the royal association of british dairy farmers as his crowning achievement .
`` 200,000 people might decide at some point it is not fashionable any more , '' he says of glastonbury 's success .
`` but the farm and the cows and the tradition of the dairy , it is lasting . ''
glastonbury : the udder side is available on bbc iplayer from 16:00 bst on friday

documents.title: top gear auditions open
text: the auditions for a role on the newly revamped top gear have opened .
videos should be no longer than 30 seconds and should feature `` no cars , no stunts , no gimmicks '' .
chris evans corrected an error he made on his breakfast show yesterday about the process , saying : `` you have to be 17 or over .
yesterday i said 16 , sorry about that . ''
he said shortlisted applicants will be asked to audition in front of him `` and anyone else if they 've already signed .
which could happen in the next few days '' .
he also warned auditionees not to send clips to his team on the radio 2 breakfast show .
for further details ,

documents.title: get in touch
text: bristling at the bad reviews for el james ' grey or just got something to get off your chest about the day 's entertainment news , then get in touch at
author: Keily Smith
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: good morning !
text: it 's friday , the weekend is almost here , and we 're still talking about top gear
but do n't worry , we 've lots of other news to share from the world of arts and entertainment - so stay tuned and it will be the end of the working day before you know it .
author: Victoria Lindrea
Arts and entertainment reporter
